Falling Tree Strike.name: Falling Tree Strike
Falling Tree Strike.flavor: As the tree falls and crushes all beneath it, your weapon smashes down to knock your foe off its feet.
Falling Tree Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Awaken the Forest.name: Awaken the Forest
Awaken the Forest.flavor: Vines burst from the ground around you to hinder your foes.
Awaken the Forest.effect: The burst creates a zone of thick vines that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. In addition, your allies have cover while within the zone. As a move action, you can move the zone 5 squares.

Form of the Verdant Lord.name: Form of the Verdant Lord
Form of the Verdant Lord.flavor: You transform into a treant, sprouting roots that draw strength from the earth and growing branches that sap life from your foes.
Form of the Verdant Lord.effect: You assume the guardian form of the verdant lord. While you are in this form, your melee reach increases by 1, you gain a +5 bonus to Strength checks to break objects, and your attacks deal triple damage to objects. In addition, at the start of each of your turns, each ally within 2 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Form of the Verdant Lord.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Verdant Lord Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Verdant Lord.requirement: The Form of the Verdant Lord power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Verdant Lord.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Form of the Verdant Lord.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
